dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependent_to.description:
VCF-kit is a command-line based collection of utilities for performing
analysis on Variant Call Format (VCF) files.
dependent_to.name: py-vcf-kit

description:
Primer3 is a widely used program for designing PCR primers (PCR =
"Polymerase Chain Reaction"). PCR is an essential and ubiquitous tool in
genetics and molecular biology. Primer3 can also design hybridization
probes and sequencing primers.
name: primer3

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
